post.body: Despite the Rolling Stone review.
For my birthday all I wanted was to see you in Toronto. Sadly, I didn't get you for a gift. I'm crossing my fingers for xmas.
Double fortunate then. That's beautiful.
Curious. Did you find your elderly Asians?
TWO BMTs!!?! Holy. Your poor baby. That's incredible he's here after that. We are two very lucky women to have these heroes.
AML? Tough. Conner was ALL, 3 1/2 year aggressive chemo protocol, flat-lined twice, still has some trouble, but she's here.
She just turned 16. We won. So grateful. PS Our entire family sits together EVERY week for Heroes. Thankful for that too.
Checked out your band. My daughter is a leukemia survivor. Starlight Foundation is amazing! My hero, thank you so much xox.
I think that would be an adorable song choice for you, Allie.
Love IS alive. I felt it. Beautiful performance last night. xo.
For a second, I thought you were talking about a haunting, like the ghost of Christmas past or something.
Hey, you! Just found this. I'm following.
http://twitpic.com/rie9 - I LOVE this!
We'll be watching at this Stella residence! xo
I love genius, but I thought I was alone. It's shown me a thing or two...kinda sounds like it's threatening me, doesn't it?
thanks, doll.
http://twitpic.com/wnav - Aaaaaaah...
Happy Christmas Eve. Hope you're treated well.
And she has "the best legs in town" apparently.
Hey, you. It's never a "bummer" to hear John Mayer.
Our windchill? Minus 23. So...yeah.
...not to meniton, one groovyass mofo.
Warm heart.
Aaaaah...warm climated states...
Nothing wrong with hangin' out with your lardier assed madre...right? I should stop typing now.
Is it wrong that I get turned on watching Santa rip his shirt off and do a snapwalk through his messy North Pole bedroom?
Funny. Clicked on this thinking that it was some Twitter-joke like all links are, and nope...naked people...doing sexy things. :)
Not tired. 3 am. What's that saying? Sleep is for the wicked..um..road-crossing chickens with their eggs in one basket? Hmm..might be tired.
Mmmmm...Viva Puffs...
Going to bed with a smile tonight knowing there are good people out there.
All day long I felt something digging in my foot. My sister showed up and pulled a tack from my slipper. I guess that means I'm indebted.
I need some effin' Christmas spirit, and I can't find anyone on ebay selling it.
Humpday. Dreamt I had City and Colour tickets that I didn't know I had. Just found them in my purse. I like when that happens.
I talk to myself all the time, and I swear sometimes I just pretend to listen...."uh huh...oh yeah...really?...wow..."
I'm a goofy goober, yeah.
going to the garden to eat worms.
"Wonder Twins powers, activate! Form of...a bucket of water!!" I always felt sorry for Zan.
I'm going to celebrate Boxing Day with punching someone in the face. :)
Oooooh...so excited. Only 109 days till Easter!!!!
In Walmart, I was scared shitless of a dancing Santa I mistook for human. Thought he was gonna go all "rollback mountain" on my ass. HoHoMo!
"Paying more than a dollar per roll is too much for toilet paper. That's my rule of bum." - my mother.
Christmas Vacation. Just as funny every year.
My hands are cold. My mom always said that means I have a warm heart. I think it has more to do with my making a snowman without mitts on.
chubby bunnies with no marshmallows. i rock at this.
